article.headline: TalkTalk shares jump on possible offer from Toscafund
article.body: Shares in TalkTalk TALK, +1.53% jumped 11% to 94 pence after saying Toscafund Asset Management has made a non-binding offer of 97 pence per share to buy it. The proposal contains a number of pre-conditions, including that its top shareholder, executive chairman Charles Dunstone, support it.
